name: Originless
short_description: All-in-one anonymous storage backend for apps, screenshot tools, and file hosting.
description: All-in-one anonymous storage backend for apps, screenshot tools, and file hosting. Originless is a self-hosted application focused on utility, tools, privacy, anonymous. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose.
usecases: Self-host Originless on your home server to all-in-one anonymous storage backend for apps, screenshot tools, and file hosting without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use Originless to manage your utility workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
